Name: A dire choice
Text: You come upon a Greater Demon and his attendants. 'Eternity has become boring,' it says, 'You will fight one of my servants for my amusement.'

Outcomes.Text: The Greater Demon rolls his three eyes, 'Then you are a coward. Let's even the playing field a little.'
The Greater Demon leans forward with interest, 'Don't die too quickly now.'
The Demon's face splits into a wide Grin. 'Excellent choice. I knew you would amuse.'
